title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1927.1 - Employment verification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1927.1 - Employment verification

State Regulations
A day reporting center MOA will include the inmate's
employer's name, address and telephone number, the inmate's extended bounds of
confinement (the most direct routes to and from work, the reporting locations
and, where applicable, locations where programs of rehabilitation are provided
as well as the day, time, and schedule of such programs), the salary or stipend
the inmate will earn or receive, and information specifying the location of the
approved residence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1927.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
